name: Moose Moose Goose
description:
'Moose Moose Goose' is a 2D endless runner, side-platformer where you're riding a moose, being chased by a goose, along the Canadian landscape. 

Can you escape the mighty Canadian Goose?

This platformer was made by 'Maple Mavericks', a team of three Game Development students for our Rapid Prototyping Class where we were presented with a constraint to create a game with only one button. 

Credits:

Lead Programmer: Harsh Koranne 

(https://www.linkedin.com/in/harsh-koranne/)

(https://www.linkedin.com/in/madhur-arora-design/)
